title: Developer's Guide
content:
# Developer's Guide

This developer guide is intended for mini program developers to get the available reference resources, such as Components and Frameworks, to quickly get started with mini program development.

Before you start, make sure you have completed the onboarding process to the Mini Program Platform. For more information, see [Getting Started for Merchant On-Boarding](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/getting-started/merchant-on-boarding).

## Development tool (IDE)

![](https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_0f16c4/afts/img/A*RLqwSrT35bwAAAAAAAAAAAAAARQnAQ)![](https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_0f16c4/afts/img/A*eXNrQqEfY_8AAAAAAAAAAAAAARQnAQ)

A one-stop development tool that helps you to quickly write, deploy and debug mini programs. [Learn more](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/mini-program-studio_overview)

## Development resources

[Framework includes the file structure and logic structure.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/framework_overview)

[A series of basic components for developers to combine them for service development.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_overview)

[Additional capabilities with a set of open-source UI components.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/extended-component_overview)

[Javascript APIs that can combine with Open APIs to provide capabilites.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_overview)

[Open APIs that can be combined with JSAPIs to provide capabilities.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/openapi_overview)

[Capabilites provided by a set of JSAPIs and Open APIs.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/capabilities)

## Related Topics

[Learn the basic steps for onboarding before you start building your own Mini Programs.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/getting-started/getting-started-guide)

[Learn product features to use the Mini Program Platform.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/overview)

[Dip into the rich UI guidelines to design a Mini Program.](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/design/guideline)
